faqs.question: How long does it take to receive my money?
faqs.answer: Transactions are processed instantly and you'll receive your fiat currency in your bank account within seconds.

faqs.question: What are the fees?
faqs.answer: We offer competitive and transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Fees are clearly displayed before you complete any transaction.

faqs.question: Is Kharon Pay safe to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! We're built on StarkNet blockchain for maximum security, use bank-grade encryption, and are fully compliant with local financial regulations.

faqs.question: Which banks are supported?
faqs.answer: We support all major Nigerian banks including GTBank, Access Bank, First Bank, UBA, Zenith Bank, and many more through direct integration.

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Simply click 'Launch App', create your account, link your bank account, and you're ready to start converting crypto to cash instantly.

faqs.question: What cryptocurrencies do you support?
faqs.answer: Currently we support USDC, USDT, and MTK tokens, with plans to add more popular cryptocurrencies based on user demand.
